text: Nearctodesmidae is a family of flat-backed millipedes in the order Polydesmida. There are about 7 genera and 17 described species in Nearctodesmidae. ==Genera== * Bistolodesmus Shelley, 1994 * Ergodesmus Chamberlin, 1949 * Harpogonopus * Kepolydesmus Chamberlin, 1910 * Leonardesmus * Nearctodesmus Silvestri, 1910 * Sakophallus Chamberlin, 1942 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Polydesmida Category:Millipede families
title: Nearctodesmidae
